ing: 1 roasted chicken, bones and skin removed, meat shredded
des: "This simple, tasty sandwich combines the great textures of whipped cream cheese, chicken, and chutney.  Use smaller croissants to turn this into an appetizer, larger ones for a nice brunch! Enjoy!"
ins: Stir together the chicken, chutney, cream cheese, and curry powder. Spread onto the split croissants and serve.
